proposal: Hey there, Catpay folks! Congrats on reaching 8374 holders, that's no small feat! 🎉 You've made web3 wallet integration a breeze for many, and we love how you've empowered users to monetize their online presence with ease. Just imagine, what if you could take it a step further? With our tools, anyone from your community could deploy a DEX or even organize a blockchain-based lottery. Sounds interesting? Let's chat! See my profile for demo and details.
